item.description:
***The event is on - Brett has confirmed. Bentara is also confirmed.***

I hope you can all make it to our February event. Our speaker is both cool and very accomplished and will certainly expand your thinking about marketing.

Please RSVP so we know how many to expect. See you there!

Description
--------------

Brett Zaccardi of Boston-based alternative marketing agency Street Attack (www.streetattack.com) will be speaking about the ways in which brands and ideas spread through online
grassroots communities through viral and word of mouth messaging.

Brett and Street Attack have worked with Red Bull, Johnson & Johnson, Microsoft, Expedia, Dunlop, and other major brands.

He
will utilize real world examples and case studies to demonstrate how
designers can fine-tune their skills to visually woo the social media
landscape.

Between MySpace, YouTube, the exploding blogosphere,
Web 2.0, and the undeniable fascination with social media,
marketing/advertising agencies and design firms with an understanding
of online viral and word of mouth marketing are in high demand.

More than ever, marketers and brands need to find ways to reach their
audiences and spread their messages on the basis of just one of the
five senses: sight. This means that graphic, web, and video designers
hold a powerful position within the current online climate.


Details
---------
We will start with
mingling, food, & drinks from 6-6:30, presentation from 6:30-7:30,
post-mingling from 7:30-whenever.
